section.heading: Effect of invalidity.
section.text: If any provision of this Act [chapter] or the application of that provision is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect any other provision or application of this Act [chapter] which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application.

annoGroup.heading: Short Title
annoGroup.annotation: Short title: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 11-1901.
